alert.note: Alert for Clarke; Oconee (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 10 at 5:35PM EST until January 11 at 7:11AM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Peachtree City GA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Georgia... Middle Oconee River near Athens affecting Clarke and Oconee Counties. For the Middle Oconee River...including Athens...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Middle Oconee River near Athens. * WHEN...Until tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 18 feet, Flood Stage is reached. Residential yards are flooded in West Athens. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:15 PM EST Wednesday the stage was 17.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this evening to a crest of 18.1 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight. - Flood stage is 18 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta. late tonight at 545 AM EST.
